messages.subject: INFORMATION GATHERED
messages.body:
DR.N_Collins
 Plot 277 Mohtala mohammed way 
 Ikeja Lagos. 
   INTRODUCTION: 
    l am DR.N_Collins. a Civil servant. l know
 this proposal will come to you as a surprise
 because we have not met before either
 physically or through correspondence. 
 I have no doubt in your ability to handle
 this proposal involving huge sum of money. 
 THE SUBJECT: MY FATHER CHIEF.Ndubuisi
 Collins.(Now Late) was the Royal Head of my
 community, ELEME (an oil rich town) in
 Nigeria. My community produces 5.8%  of the
 total crude oil production in Nigeria and
 0.5%  of the Dollar value of each barrel is
 paid to my father as royalty by the Federal
 Government. My father was also the Chairman
 of ELEME Special Oil Trust Fund. 
 In his position as the Royal head and
 Chairman of the Oil Trust Fund, he made some
 money which he left for me as the only thing
 to inherit. The money is Ten Million Five
 Hundred Thousand US Dollars($10.5m). This
 Money originated from the accumulation 
 between 1976-1998. 
 Due to poor banking system in Nigeria and
 political instability as a result of past
 Military rules (1985-1999) , he deposited
 this Money in a  Strong Room/"VAULTS" with
 an open beneficiary in Apex Bank of Nigeria
 pending when he would finish arrangement to
 transfer it abroad as a CONTRACT PAYMENT. He
  was planning this when he died late last
 year of Heart Attack. 
 THE PROPOSAL: Just before my father died he 
 called my attention to the money and charged
 me to look for a foreigner who would assist
 me in the transfer/investment of the funds
 abroad. So l 
 would be very grateful if you could accept to
 help me archieve this great objective. I
 promise to give you 20% of the total funds
 transferred to your vital bank account as
 compensation for your assistance. Five
 percent (5%)would be set aside to take care
 of all expenses we may incure during the
 transaction. To indicate your interest,
 contact me urgently and  confidentially for
 more information and the roles you will play
 in this business. All the legal information
 concerning  this Money will be sent to you
 as soon as we agree together. Send your
 reply through this mail  box. 
   May the almighty God bless you. 
   Yours faithfully, 
   DR.N_Collins.
messages.raw:
N D COLLINS (ndcollins@indiatimes.com)

DR.N_Collins
Plot 277 Mohtala mohammed way
Ikeja Lagos.
INTRODUCTION:
l am DR.N_Collins. a Civil servant. l know this proposal will come to you as a surprise because we have not met before either physically or through correspondence. I have no doubt in your ability to handle this proposal involving huge sum of money.
THE SUBJECT: MY FATHER CHIEF.Ndubuisi Collins.(Now Late) was the Royal Head of my community, ELEME (an oil rich town) in Nigeria. My community produces 5.8% of the total crude oil production in Nigeria and 0.5% of the Dollar value of each barrel is paid to my father as royalty by the Federal Government. My father was also the Chairman of ELEME Special Oil Trust Fund.
In his position as the Royal head and Chairman of the Oil Trust Fund, he made some money which he left for me as the only thing to inherit. The money is Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars($10.5m). This Money originated from the accumulation between 1976-1998.
Due to poor banking system in Nigeria and political instability as a result of past Military rules (1985-1999) , he deposited this Money in a Strong Room/"VAULTS" with an open beneficiary in Apex Bank of Nigeria pending when he would finish arrangement to transfer it abroad as a CONTRACT PAYMENT. He was planning this when he died late last year of Heart Attack.
THE PROPOSAL: Just before my father died he called my attention to the money and charged me to look for a foreigner who would assist me in the transfer/investment of the funds abroad. So l
would be very grateful if you could accept to help me archieve this great objective. I promise to give you 20% of the total funds transferred to your vital bank account as compensation for your assistance. Five percent (5%)would be set aside to take care of all expenses we may incure during the transaction. To indicate your interest, contact me urgently and confidentially for more information and the roles you will play in this business. All the legal information concerning this Money will be sent to you as soon as we agree together. Send your reply through this mail box.
May the almighty God bless you.
Yours faithfully,
DR.N_Collins.

messages.subject: Respond urgently
messages.body:
Dear Candy,



How are you doing today?  I strongly believe that every body around you is bouncing in good health.  Thanks a lot for responding to my mail.


For us to achieve the needed success in this transaction you must keep every correspondence concerning this fund to your self alone and highly confidential as the transaction demand, because this fund is the life and future of my family.


1. This transaction is 100% risk free so you dont have any thing to fear.
2.    You have to assure me that you will not cheat me or try to divert this fund when it is released to you in cash, I have placed my only landed property for sale, so that I can settle all the expenses that might occur during the process of moving this fund out of my country, because that is the easiest way for us to achieve success.
3. I need your private telephone and fax number so that I can contact you directly on the phone and a copy of your identity for my recognition.
4. Upon the confirmation of the above information from you I will not hesitate to send the open beneficiary certificate of the fund  as it was issued in 1998 and a copy of me and my wife picture for your recognition and record.
5. Must importantly, I want you to  bear at the back of your mind that people around family and even extended are searching and nosing around my family to get on information or the order knowing fully well that with the position of my late father when he was alive, that he must keep some thing good/wealth/cash for me, but I am very happy that nobody except the my family Lawyer and the security company  know the amount involve that was deposited with an open beneficiary, so for any reason some body else contact you  concerning this transaction/fund, kindly let me know and send the mail to me for proper action, because I know you will be contacted for help  so you have to bear this in mind for us to achieve the needed gold and as it is  the life and future of my family is in your hand the moment we start, and I am assuring you of success because I am optimistic.
6. Also note that what ever expenses you or my self will incur during the process of claiming this fund must be deducted from the percentage set aside for expenditure, your telephone bills is included if any.
7. As soon as I hear from you the information of the security company will be sent  to you for confirmation because the moment you furnish me with your contact particulars, my family Lawyer  will go ahead and submit it to the security company through an insider of the company for computerization and in putting of your name and  contact particulars to the company data  memory for the claiming of the fund in question.
8. This will be done through the insider so you dont have any thing to worry as all the necessary underground arrangement has been perfected.
9. Finally, I will invest my share of this fund in a  profitable line of product which you will advise  or better invest in your company as a share holder if only you will permit and protect my interest as a foreigner.
10. This fund must be moved out of this country  diplomatically, so you have to start arranging your travelling papers.
I  hope that with this above explanation you are very clear with this deal and feel very free to ask question where you did not understand so that I can clarify you more to avoid misunderstanding when this fund is released to you and I come over to your country.


It is very good that you are a princess and i am a prince, this is the work of the almighty.


Be fine,


Regards,


Collins.

How are you doing? I got your mail and the content noted.

This fund in question is now in Holland in candice name and has to me claimed immediately, and nobody on this earth can claim the fund except Candice, so you people should hurry up before the fund start accumulating demorage.

This is the nature of this deal or better give me a power of attorney so that i can look for another person who can assist me.

Collins.

[Scam-o-note: a power of attorney is a document which, for instance, gives someone else - normally a trusted grown child, or a family lawyer - control over your legal affairs and finances. It's the kind of thing you would arrange if you felt it too difficult to keep up or had become very ill. You would not - we hope! - give a total stranger, aka scammer, a power of attorney for any reason, and his request for a POA so he can go scam someone else makes no sense either, but you knew that. Didn't you?]
